name: Winter is coming and you're a squirrel
name_original: Winter is coming and you're a squirrel
description:
My submission page - https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-3/rate/573580

Welcome to "Winter is coming",  a squirrel simulator game where you jump from tree to tree, collecting acorns to feed your family, and burying acorns in order to make it through the harsh winter

- mouse sensitivity and controls can be accessed in the options screen

note - if you play and rate my game during the gamejam, make sure to leave a comment as if you do i will rate your game too!
